TopicTitle: KSP Loading equivalent for KSP2/Star Theory updates?

Articles.Content:
Hey Team, I was wondering what sort of updates we might see regarding KSP2 or from Star Theory about progress

We have KSP Loading keeping us in the loop on 1.8 progress with the Unity update to 2019.2, the texture revamps for planetary bodies, new SRB's (with gimballing even!) so I was hoping we would see something similar in regards to their ongoing development

Would be great to get a brief VLOG or something from the folks at Bellevue, if they've got stuff they're allowed to share at least!
They said we'll be getting updates after the KSP 2 section of the forums is fully fleshed out, but before they can do that they said they need to upgrade the servers.
